item.description: This class creates a forced movement of type "forced_translation", applies it to itself then die.

field.name: forced_translation_creator.duration
field.description: The total time of the movement.

field.name: forced_translation_creator.slant
field.description: The angle applied to the item.

field.name: forced_translation_creator.force_angle
field.description: Tell (true) if we apply the angle as is or (false) if the angle is added to the angle of the item.

field.name: forced_translation_creator.speed.x
field.description: The speed of the movement on the X axis.

field.name: forced_translation_creator.speed.y
field.description: The speed of the movement on the Y axis.
